page.title: 16Rhenigidale Library/Church
page.content: The library and the church are both in the same place _ the school.{Church} There is no Church of Scotland minister here. So every so often the minister or one of his missionaries come from Tarbert.They either go round the houses and have a small service in each or sometimes they have a service in the school. The church has always been held in the school. There is a small pulpit there like any other church and chairs and hymmbooks too. {Library}The library is in the school as well. When necessary the library in Stornoway sends over boxes of books. These contain over a hundred titles covering all tastes _ romances, westerns, mysteries, religious and juvenile. When these have been read they are returned to Stornoway and replaced by a further selection.
